author: cnbc.com
title: Masimo beats Street 4Q forecasts
text:
IRVINE, Calif. (AP) _ Masimo Corp. (MASI) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter profit of $367,000.
The Irvine, California-based company said it had net income of 1 cent per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax expenses and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, came to 72 cents per share.
The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 61 cents per share.
The medical technology company posted revenue of $225.2 million in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $201.6 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $131.6 million, or $2.36 per share. Revenue was reported as $798.1 million.
Masimo expects full-year earnings to be $2.80 per share, with revenue expected to be $836 million.
Masimo shares have climbed 1.5 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $86.08, a drop of almost 5 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on MASI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/MASI
